1.0.name: wordpress/wezo-smart-links
1.0.description:
Operation: The plugin enables the bar of the post formatting options icon Clicking the icon will open a window that contains the form for registration of links Links will be saved in the bank and will be available in Smart Links List tab Sign In / Choose a link unit the following code is inserted in the post where XXX is the id of the block saved in the database.

Example: the following links on this page are being entered via the plugin is not formatted but I'm working on the option to insert CSS for block

[smartlinks id="3"]
